post:
For the LowEndTalk users we have a special server deal  


Dell PowerEdge R210

Intel i3 540

4GB DDR3

2x2TB HDD

10TB Traffic


Monthly price €30 (EUR) / $33 (USD)


Order: https://cp.hostio.nl/cart.php?a=add&pid=28

During the ordering process you have the option to order additional data traffic or SSD storage

Payment methods: Bank Transfer & Bitcoin & Credit Card


The server will be setup within 7 days.



Network information:

Our servers are placed in the DataOne datacenter in Wormer (NL).

Network number: AS64427 

http://bgp.he.net/AS64427#_asinfo
